title: New: Ranking Distribution, Annotations & More | Similarweb
description: Feature release highlights for August are here. Get the lowdown on how they will help you and where you can access them on Similarweb. Read on now!
content: HomeBlogUpdatesProduct UpdatesRank Digital Marketing Intelligence's Features for August 2021 Updates Rank Digital Marketing Intelligence’s Features for August 2021 See for Yourself by Owen Badham , Senior Product Marketing Manager at Similarweb 2 Min. August 19, 2021 X Facebook Linkedin Copy link Free Website Traffic Checker Discover your competitors' strengths and leverage them to achieve your own success Analyze Traffic Welcome to our monthly Digital Marketing Intelligence solution update. And we’ve got big news for SEO marketers: Ranking Distribution for any website is finally here. Oh, and you can now filter Video page results by campaign and use Annotations to point out data points and insights to collaborate directly with your team in Similarweb. Ready for the inside scoop? Ranking Distribution: Rank your website higher We hear you – rank data is crucial. So you’re going to love our new ‘Ranking Distribution’ feature. Now you can: Quickly understand how any website is ranking Get a detailed look at all the keywords they’re ranking for Understand how they’re changing over time Whether you’re monitoring SEO performance or identifying long-tail keyword opportunities, Ranking Distribution is bound to help you boost your website’s ranking! Try it out now. Video Page Filters: Reel in your competitors’ video ads Cut through your competitors’ digital video ad campaigns and pinpoint what’s making their display strategies tick, like lightning. With our new filters, you can refine your video ad research and deep dive into your competitor’s video marketing strategy further (and faster) than ever. Combine filters to pinpoint videos and understand which networks, campaigns, and ad networks they are associated with. See Video Page Filters in action. Insight Annotations: One to take note of… Now you can collaborate with your teammates by adding annotations to noteworthy trends. Add context to the research and insights you’ve uncovered by marking notable spikes or dips in traffic data. Check the Website’s Performance, Traffic & Engagement, or Marketing Channels, hover over a specific date on the line graphs, and click the blue icon to get ‘noting’. Click here to start annotating with your team. Your amazing feedback helps us prioritize which features to develop next. Have any thoughts on our latest updates or features you’d like to see? Get in touch via our Live Chat, Social, or through your Account Manager. Thanks for reading. See you next month. by Owen Badham Senior Product Marketing Manager at Similarweb A product marketer with 10+ years in SaaS, specializing in product launches, GTM strategy, and collateral production. Related Topics: Product Updates SEO This post is subject to Similarweb legal notices and disclaimers.
